name: obsidian-to-jekyll
description: Convert Obsidian notes to Jekyll site with multi-view support

scripts.build: npm run convert && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:player: npm run convert:player && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build:dm: npm run convert:dm && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.serve: npm run convert && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.serve:player: npm run convert:player && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.serve:dm: npm run convert:dm && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.deploy:both: npm run deploy:player && npm run deploy:dm

author: Robert McCowan
